DrawingService
service in module accessimapEditeurDerApp

Description

Service providing drawing functions Provide functions to

  • init a map/draw area
  • draw features

Dependencies

  • LayerService
  • ToolboxService

Methods

  • initDrawing(elements, format)

    Create the drawing svg in a dom element with specific size

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    elementsObject

    Object containing each layer (overlay, drawing, geojson) with a sel & proj property

    These properties are given by D3SvgOverlay and help us to display at the right place features & drawings

    formatenum

    Format (landscapeA4, landscapeA3, ...) of the drawing

  • updateFeatureStyleAndColor(style)

    Update the style (pattern) & color of a feature. Could be a geojson feature or a drawing feature.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    styleObject

    SettingsService.STYLES object
